name: Space Detective Sara
description:
• Prologue
    One day, Space Detective Sara receives an order to collect the treasures of the Space Pirate King.
    It was an effort to alleviate the financial difficulties
    confronted by the Galaxy Police.
    The secrets of these treasures are carved on a stone monument owned by the Galaxy Police.
    However, the Three Galaxy Balls were required to decode this monument.
    Sara thereby departs for her journey to collect the Three Galaxy Balls
    by visiting various planets scattered across the galaxy...
  • Mystery Solving RPG
    The dungeon changes its shape and form each time you enter.
    You complete the game by defeating enemies with your gun as you encounter them.
    Your belongings can be upgraded.
    Characters are animated while idle,
    and your clothes become torn when receiving damage.
    The planets Sara visits each have a mystery.
    The key to solve these mysteries lies with polymerization.
    Collect materials and polymerize on-demand for success.
    Since we anticipate difficulty for beginners, we have attached hints on completing this game.
    This game required 6 hours to complete during our dry run.
  • Sex Scene
    The sex scenes involve being raped by the nasty aliens.
    Each scene involves 15 ~ 20 illustrations. Please enjoy Sara being humiliated.
    All CVs were performed by Ms. Shirakawa Pako.
  • Sex upon Item Polymerization
    Clash with 'Heart' enemies and use your body
    to enter the sex scene required to collect items.
    No text or illustrations involved. Jam out to escape.
  • Sex upon defeat
    Once your HP hits 0, it's sex upon defeat.
    You experience an intense sex experience with text and illustrations.
    You can return to your base camp upon defeat.
